scripts.update-kv: node -e "const cp = require('child_process'); if (process.platform === 'win32') { console.error('The \'update-kv\' script is Unix/Mac only because it runs scripts/update-kv-with-wrangler.sh.'); process.exit(1); } else { const r = cp.spawnSync('bash', ['scripts/update-kv-with-wrangler.sh'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status ?? 0); }"
